active_learning.discussion_prompt: In light of privacy regulations like GDPR, debate the trade-offs between protecting personal data in WHOIS records (e.g., redaction of registrant details) and the needs of threat intelligence analysts for actionable OSINT. Provide examples of cases where redacted WHOIS data hindered investigations, such as phishing campaigns or malware C2 domains.
